## 研发学习资料

#### 前端

+ [less](http://lesscss.org/)
+ [EcmaScript 6](https://babeljs.io/learn-es2015/)
+ [React](https://facebook.github.io/react/)
+ [webpack](http://webpack.github.io/)
+ [Promise](https://github.com/promises-aplus/promises-spec)
+ [CommonJS](https://webpack.github.io/docs/commonjs.html)

#### 后端

+ [bash](https://github.com/Idnan/bash-guide)
+ [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/en/)
+ [Express](https://expressjs.com/)

#### 低优先级

+ [Jasmine(单元测试)](https://jasmine.github.io/)
+ [Jest(React单元测试)](https://facebook.github.io/jest/)
+ [Moment.js(日期处理类库)](http://momentjs.com/)
